name: 數理統計（一）
description: 本課程是研究隨機現象統計規律的一門學科。它提供統計研究與應用的理論基礎。內容包括常用分配之介紹、參數之估計及檢定、估計量之充分性、一致性、有效性等，期能建構推論統計學的理論基礎。
goals: 介紹統計學的進階理論基礎
syllabus:
每週主題(各一週，期中期末考各一週，共18週) 

01  1: Important Inequalities   2: Extension to several Random Variables

02  1: Transformation: Random Vectors

03  1: The Gamma, Chi-square, and Beta Distribution

04  1: The Normal Distribution   2: The Multivariate Normal Distribution

05  1: t and F-Distribution   2: Expectation of Functions

06  1: Convergence in Probability

07  1: Convergence in Distribution

08  1: Central Limit Theorem

09  1: Asymptotics for Multivariate Distributions

10  1: Sampling and Statistics

11  1: Order Statistics

12  1: Tolerance Limits for Distributions  2: More on Confidence Intervals

13  1: Introduction to Hypothesis Testing

14  1: Additional Comments About Statistical Tests

15  1: Chi-Square Tests

16  1: The Method of Monte Carlo  2: Bootstrap Procedures

methodologies.note: 講述數理統計重要概念與理論

grading.note: (與平時勾選的作業有關，約莫2次。)
